recipe.title: Baked Beans
recipe.instruction: Wash and soak one pound navy beans over night.
Boil slowly twenty minutes and drain.
Add 1/2 pound salt pork cut in thick slices, 1/4 cup molasses or brown sugar, salt to taste.
Cover with water and bake in slow oven about six hours.
Add water, a little at a time as needed.

recipe.title: Butter Beans, Paprika and Piquillo Peppers
recipe.blurb: These beans are great in salads. Let the mix cool and then toss through a selection of salad leaves and herbs. Perk up the leaves with a little olive oil and vinegar and some crispy lavash on top.
recipe.title: Ingredients
recipe.ingredient: butter beans or lima beans, drained and rinsed
jarred piquillo peppers, rinsed and sliced
recipe.title: Step 1
recipe.instruction: In a wide-based pan over a medium heat, caramelize the red onions in 5 Tbsp. of the olive oil for 15 minutes or until they turn golden and soft. Add a little fine salt, the garlic and spices and continue to cook for 2–3 minutes. Add the tomato purée and cook for another minute.
recipe.title: Step 2
recipe.instruction: Add the beans and sherry vinegar and reduce the liquid by half over a medium heat. Turn the heat off. Add the piquillo peppers and the remaining olive oil and season with salt to serve.
